DataToBuild - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.model
This class is used to contain all the useful data to do a build of a block or a dome.
DataToBuild(GameSession, Player, Worker, Coord, Boolean) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.model.DataToBuild
Non default constructor that sets all the attributes invoking also the DataToMove constructor.
DataToMove - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.model
This class is used to contain all the useful information to move a worker.
DataToMove(GameSession, Player, Worker, Coord) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.model.DataToMove
Noj default constructor that sets all the attributes of the object.
DecoratorFactory - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards
This class is an interface that is used to implement different types of wrapping-up cards with extra functionalities.
deletePlayer(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.modelHandlers.PlayersHandler
This method delete the data of a player identified by a nickname from the list of players' data.

DoubleDifferentSpaceBehaviour - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.behaviours.buildBehaviours

DoubleSameSpaceBehaviour - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.behaviours.buildBehaviours
